Attackdex

Name Type Category PP Power Accuracy Description
Absorb 25 30 100 A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
Astonish 15 40 100 The user attacks the target while shouting startingly. This may also make it flinch.
Brutal Swing 20 90 100 The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.
Crabhammer 10 100 90 The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.
Dizzy Punch 10 70 100 The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches and may be left confused.
Hail 10 — — The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except Ice types.
Heat Wave 10 100 90 The user exhales hot breath on opposing Pokémon. This may also leave them with a burn.
Magma Storm 5 100 75 The target becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for four to five turns.
Mega Drain 15 55 100 A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
Moonlight 5 — — The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.
Morning Sun 5 — — The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.
Nightmare 15 — 100 A sleeping target sees a nightmare that damages every turn and confuses it.
Razor Wind 10 70 100 Blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.
Scorching Sands 10 70 100 The user throws scorching sand at the target. This may also leave it with a burn.
Skull Bash 10 130 100 The user raises its Attack and Defense stats, then rams the target on the next turn.
Solar Beam 10 120 100 A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.
Submission 20 120 100 The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground, also damaging the user.
Synthesis 5 — — The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.
Thunder 10 110 70 A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target. This may also leave it with paralysis.
Withdraw 20 — — The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.
